text: Margie is a 1946 American romantic comedy movie directed by Henry King and starring Jeanne Crain, Glenn Langan, Lynn Bari, Alan Young, Barbara Lawrence, Conrad Janis, Esther Dale, Hobart Cavanaugh, Ann E. Todd, Hattie McDaniel. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was spun off into a television series in 1961. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Henry King
title: Margie (1946 movie)
